main.name: Katya Juliet
main.description: I am a leader in communication, digital technology, & project management
main.bio: I am a creative, strategic, down-to-earth visionary & natural-born leader with a positive outlook, great attention to detail & high integrity. I believe that Communication is the key to success and can make or break any brand or project. My creative background gives me an edge in the marketplace as industries are realizing how critical authenticity, engagement, and world-class customer experience truly is. If you can connect with people in a genuine way, and engage through storytelling, curated voices, &  relationships in the right format and moment in time, you will form bonds & loyalty with consumers that transcend beyond facts and figures.
main.contactmessage: I would love to learn more about you and partner together for exceptional results!

resume.skillmessage: MERN Developer • Front / Back end Dev • HTML • CSS • Javascript • Jquery • Bootstrap • NodeJS • JEST  • REACT • Wireframing • Graphic Design • Video & Audio Production • Small Business Consulting • Team & Communication leadership

education.description: 6-month intensive bootcamp with UC Berkeley for Full-Stack Development hybrid course.
Graduated with honors from UC Davis with a B.A in Communication, with focus on digital media & consumer behaviors.

work.title: Wireframe, UX, Design, Project Management
work.description: Connect, Communicate, and Collaborate with sayeYO! sayeYO is a full-featured communication app with secure text and multi-media messaging including full-length songs and automatic language translation, voice and video calling, WiFi calling, promo video maker, music storage, audio compression, web, social, and music link storage, plus much more.

work.title: Full-Stack Developer & Designer
work.description: Buzzword Consulting provides small business consulting, startup and communication consulting as well as tech services including website and mobile app development, graphic design, video and podcast production, marketing, project management and more. Clients range across a variety of industries. PM Leadership of a team of developers and designers.

testimonials.text: Remarkable, professional, and a delight to work and consult with. Making the decision to hire Katya Lerner was the right call for our Book Cover designs, websites, marketing and more!
Thanks for your commitment Katya… we hope you know how valued you are. I think you are brilliant and am in awe of your time management skills alone. Wish I had them.
testimonials.user: Christine Merser, Creator, Blue Shoe Content
